blockExtEnable.name: Enable the display of emblem icons for files on removable block devices
blockExtEnable.name[zh_CN]: 启用在可移动块设备中显示文件扩展角标
blockExtEnable.description[zh_CN]: 用于控制是否在块设备中显示文件扩展角标
blockExtEnable.description: It's used to control whether to display emblem icons for files on removable block devices.
